text: Vincent Perez (born 10 June 1964) is a Swiss-French actor, director and photographer. He is best known for playing the title character, Ashe Corven, in The Crow: City of Angels,Shapiro, Mark. "Vincent Perez is Ashe. The Crow: City of Angels Official Magazine. 1996. Retrieved 18 April 2010 and for starring in Queen of the Damned, playing Marius de Romanus.Guerif, Francois. "Vincent Perez Unmasked". Vogue Hommes International Mode. 1997. title: Vincent Perez
